description: Weather data for gardening and landscaping decisions - soil temperature, moisture, frost alerts, and growing conditions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT (t_hr_avg * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Air Temp"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND t_hr_avg IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY utc_datetime DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT (soil_temp_10 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Soil Temp 10cm"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND soil_temp_10 IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY utc_datetime DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT soil_moisture_10 as "Soil Moisture"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND soil_moisture_10 IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY utc_datetime DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT rh_hr_avg as "Humidity"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND rh_hr_avg IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY utc_datetime DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p_calc), 0) / 25.4 as "Precipitation"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND p_calc IS NOT NULL
  AND p_calc > 0
  AND utc_datetime >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN MIN((t_min * 9.0/5.0) + 32) <= 28 THEN 3
    WHEN MIN((t_min * 9.0/5.0) + 32) <= 32 THEN 2
    WHEN MIN((t_min * 9.0/5.0) + 32) <= 36 THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END as "Frost Risk"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND t_min IS NOT NULL
  AND utc_datetime >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'

panels.title: Soil Conditions - Critical for Seeding & Fertilizing

panels.description:
Soil temperature at multiple depths. Key thresholds:
- >50°F: Safe for cool-season crops
- >60°F: Safe for warm-season crops
- >70°F: Optimal for most vegetables

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  (soil_temp_5 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "5cm",
  (soil_temp_10 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "10cm",
  (soil_temp_20 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "20cm",
  (soil_temp_50 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "50cm",
  (soil_temp_100 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "100cm"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Soil Temperature by Depth

panels.description:
Soil moisture (fractional water content) at multiple depths.
- <0.10: Very dry - irrigate
- 0.15-0.30: Optimal range
- >0.40: Saturated - avoid fertilizer

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  soil_moisture_5 as "5cm",
  soil_moisture_10 as "10cm",
  soil_moisture_20 as "20cm",
  soil_moisture_50 as "50cm",
  soil_moisture_100 as "100cm"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Soil Moisture by Depth

panels.description: Air temperature with frost thresholds shown

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  (t_hr_avg * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Avg",
  (t_max * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Max",
  (t_min * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Min"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Air Temperature

panels.description:
Growing Degree Days (GDD) accumulated over time.
Base temperature: 50°F
GDD = max(0, (Tmax + Tmin)/2 - Tbase)

Useful for predicting plant development stages.

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily_gdd AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE(utc_datetime) as day,
    GREATEST(0, ((MAX(t_max) * 9.0/5.0) + 32 + (MIN(t_min) * 9.0/5.0) + 32) / 2.0 - 50) as daily_gdd
  FROM observations o
  JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
  WHERE s.wbanno = $station
    AND t_max IS NOT NULL
    AND t_min IS NOT NULL
    AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY DATE(utc_datetime)
)
SELECT 
  day as time,
  SUM(daily_gdd) OVER (ORDER BY day) as "Accumulated GDD (base 50°F)"
FROM daily_gdd
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Growing Degree Days (Cumulative)

panels.description:
Precipitation amounts. Avoid fertilizing:
- 24-48h before expected rain
- When soil is saturated

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  p_calc / 25.4 as "Precipitation"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND p_calc IS NOT NULL
  AND p_calc > 0
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Precipitation

panels.description: Relative humidity. High humidity (>80%) combined with warm temps increases disease risk (fungal infections, blight).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  rh_hr_avg as "Humidity"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND rh_hr_avg IS NOT NULL
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Relative Humidity

panels.description: Optimal conditions for common gardening activities based on current data.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT 
    (soil_temp_10 * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as soil_temp_10_f,
    soil_moisture_10,
    (t_hr_avg * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as t_hr_avg_f,
    t_min,
    p_calc,
    rh_hr_avg
  FROM observations o
  JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
  WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  ORDER BY utc_datetime DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
recent_precip AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p_calc), 0) / 25.4 as total_precip_in
  FROM observations o
  JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
  WHERE s.wbanno = $station
    AND p_calc > 0
    AND utc_datetime >= NOW() - INTERVAL '48 hours'
)
SELECT 
  'Seed Cool-Season Crops' as "Activity",
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f >= 50 AND l.soil_temp_10_f <= 68 AND l.soil_moisture_10 BETWEEN 0.15 AND 0.35 THEN 'OPTIMAL'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f >= 45 AND l.soil_temp_10_f <= 77 THEN 'GOOD'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f < 41 THEN 'POOR'
    ELSE 'NOT IDEAL'
  END as "Status",
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f < 41 THEN 'Soil too cold (<41°F)'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f > 77 THEN 'Soil too warm (>77°F)'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.1 THEN 'Soil too dry'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 > 0.4 THEN 'Soil too wet'
    ELSE 'Soil temp: ' || ROUND(l.soil_temp_10_f::numeric, 1) || '°F, moisture: ' || ROUND((l.soil_moisture_10 * 100)::numeric, 0) || '%'
  END as "Reason"
FROM latest l, recent_precip r
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Seed Warm-Season Crops',
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f >= 65 AND l.soil_temp_10_f <= 86 AND l.soil_moisture_10 BETWEEN 0.15 AND 0.35 THEN 'OPTIMAL'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f >= 59 THEN 'GOOD'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f < 59 THEN 'POOR'
    ELSE 'NOT IDEAL'
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f < 59 THEN 'Soil too cold (<59°F) for warm crops'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.1 THEN 'Soil too dry for germination'
    ELSE 'Soil temp: ' || ROUND(l.soil_temp_10_f::numeric, 1) || '°F'
  END
FROM latest l, recent_precip r
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Apply Fertilizer',
  CASE 
    WHEN r.total_precip_in > 0.4 THEN 'POOR'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 > 0.4 THEN 'POOR'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.1 THEN 'NOT IDEAL'
    WHEN l.soil_temp_10_f >= 50 AND l.soil_moisture_10 BETWEEN 0.15 AND 0.30 THEN 'OPTIMAL'
    ELSE 'GOOD'
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN r.total_precip_in > 0.4 THEN 'Recent rain (' || ROUND(r.total_precip_in::numeric, 2) || 'in in 48h) - fertilizer will wash away'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 > 0.4 THEN 'Soil saturated - nutrients will leach'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.1 THEN 'Soil dry - water first for better absorption'
    ELSE 'Good conditions for fertilizer application'
  END
FROM latest l, recent_precip r
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Irrigate / Water',
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.10 THEN 'OPTIMAL'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.15 THEN 'GOOD'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 > 0.35 THEN 'POOR'
    ELSE 'NOT IDEAL'
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 < 0.10 THEN 'Soil very dry (' || ROUND((l.soil_moisture_10 * 100)::numeric, 0) || '%) - water needed'
    WHEN l.soil_moisture_10 > 0.35 THEN 'Soil moist enough (' || ROUND((l.soil_moisture_10 * 100)::numeric, 0) || '%)'
    ELSE 'Soil moisture: ' || ROUND((l.soil_moisture_10 * 100)::numeric, 0) || '%'
  END
FROM latest l, recent_precip r
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Spray Fungicide',
  CASE 
    WHEN l.rh_hr_avg > 85 AND l.t_hr_avg_f > 59 THEN 'OPTIMAL'
    WHEN l.rh_hr_avg > 75 THEN 'GOOD'
    ELSE 'NOT IDEAL'
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN l.rh_hr_avg > 85 AND l.t_hr_avg_f > 59 THEN 'High disease risk - humidity ' || ROUND(l.rh_hr_avg::numeric, 0) || '%, temp ' || ROUND(l.t_hr_avg_f::numeric, 1) || '°F'
    WHEN l.rh_hr_avg < 60 THEN 'Low disease pressure - humidity only ' || ROUND(l.rh_hr_avg::numeric, 0) || '%'
    ELSE 'Moderate conditions - monitor plants'
  END
FROM latest l, recent_precip r

panels.title: Gardening Activity Recommendations

panels.description: Daily summary showing temperature range and precipitation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(utc_datetime) as "Date",
  ROUND(((MAX(t_max) * 9.0/5.0) + 32)::numeric, 1) as "Max Temp",
  ROUND(((MIN(t_min) * 9.0/5.0) + 32)::numeric, 1) as "Min Temp",
  ROUND((COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN p_calc > 0 THEN p_calc ELSE 0 END), 0) / 25.4)::numeric, 2) as "Precipitation",
  ROUND(GREATEST(0, ((MAX(t_max) * 9.0/5.0) + 32 + (MIN(t_min) * 9.0/5.0) + 32) / 2.0 - 50)::numeric, 1) as "GDD"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY DATE(utc_datetime)
ORDER BY DATE(utc_datetime) DESC
LIMIT 14

panels.title: Daily Summary (Last 14 Days)

panels.description: Solar radiation in W/m². Higher values = more photosynthesis potential and evapotranspiration.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  solarad as "Solar Radiation"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND solarad IS NOT NULL
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Solar Radiation

panels.description:
Surface/ground temperature. Important for:
- Seedling microclimate
- Frost damage risk
- Mulch effectiveness

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  utc_datetime as time,
  (sur_temp * 9.0/5.0) + 32 as "Surface Temp"
FROM observations o
JOIN stations s ON o.wbanno = s.wbanno
WHERE s.wbanno = $station
  AND sur_temp IS NOT NULL
  AND utc_datetime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY utc_datetime

panels.title: Surface Temperature

list.definition: SELECT wbanno as __value, name || ' (' || state || ')' as __text FROM stations ORDER BY state, name
list.label: Station
list.name: station
list.query: SELECT wbanno as __value, name || ' (' || state || ')' as __text FROM stations ORDER BY state, name

title: Gardening Weather Dashboard
